item.title: Impressions of the Nexus 7 Tablet
item.description: For those that know me, ordering a Google Nexus 7 Tablet when it was released isn't much of a surprise. I did wait a day though. :-) The Nexus 7 Tablet joins the stable of portable devices at home, which include a couple of iPad 1s, and iPad 3, a couple â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
